data.text: Yahweh my God, I come to you to protect me.
If you do not do that, they will tear me into pieces
Yahweh my God, if I have done anything that is wrong,
if I have done evil to some friend who did good things to me,
allow my enemies to pursue me and capture me.
But Yahweh, because you are very angry with those who pursue me,
Gather around you the people of all nations,
Yahweh, judge the people of all nations!
God, you know what every person is thinking,
God, you protect me like a shield protects soldiers [MET];
Whenever your enemies do not ◄repent/change their behavior►,
You are preparing your weapons that kill those whom they strike;
But when they dig a deep pit to trap others,
They themselves will experience the trouble that they want to cause others to have;
I praise Yahweh because he always acts righteously/justly;
